extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     A GPA of 2.6 in FILM and (a grade of B- in FILM110 or FILM104&106) and 6.0 units in FILM.

basic.description: Intermediate examination of film and television in Canada since 1980, taking into account regional difference and other cultural, political, and economic distinctions.
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Contemporary Canadian Film & Television
